announcement.text:
DOCE: Hello World Extension (DOCE: HW) v1.0.0
An Extension that displays the text 'Hello World!' in a window with a Close Button.
For Fantasy Grounds Classic v3.3.11+, the DORCoreMin Ruleset, and selected child Rulesets.
By Matthew J BLACK (Dulux-Oz).
Copyright ©2004-2020 Peregrine I.T. Pty Ltd.
All Rights Reserved.
